name: EggFight
description:
Be the winner among the eggs!

The fun and exciting VR casual action game, 'EggFight'!

You can choose one of the weapons to join the battlefield.

The mission on the battlefield is to crash the eggs 10 times, not to die. If you complete this mission, you can be the winner.

Crash and interrupt the other eggs so they don't complete their mission.

Welcome to the 'EggFight'! Be the winner in the fight against eggs for their hatchlings!
